授業目的: Introduce students to business entrepreneurship. Developing a new business product or service and sharing your idea.
到達目標: - Learn about the fundamentals of entrepreneurship- Discuss case studies and apply critical thinking skills- Create, name, and develop a new product or service- Create a marketing survey, collect data, analyze, and present results- Multimedia presentation(s) using business English- Create a professional business (marketing) plan- Create a professional, interesting video describing product or service benefits- Produce a professional western style business resume- Participate in a job interview and effectively answer and ask questions
授業の概要・背景:
- Remember and understand main ideas and details from readings and video content through summaries, discussions, and connections
- Synthesize information and concepts to create new ideas through charts, diagrams, videos, and inventions
- Analyze and evaluate information and data providing comparisons, explanations, inferences, critiques, and recommendations using discourse markers and business vocabulary
- Communicate through the understanding and use of gestures, eye contact and tone of voice while applying business concepts and vocabulary
授業方法: - group discussions, case studies- new product or service development- survey development and analysis- video production- presentation(s)- business (marketing) plan- resume creation- job interview

各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する以下の能力が養成されます。
言語教育科目：１．言語コミュニケーション能力：外国語を生かし、積極的に発信できる。２．異文化理解・多文化共生力：異文化に対する感受性をもち、多様な文化と共生できる。
